faq.question: How does the process work?
faq.answer: Upon consultations about your project and enrolling it, our team will work with you to understand your vision and create a high-quality final product, professionally edited by our experienced editors.
faq.question2: How long does the editing process take?
faq.answer2: Depending on the complexity of the project and the workload of our editors, this can vary from one day to several days but never later than the agreed deadline.
faq.question3: How will I receive my edited video?
faq.answer3: Once your edit is complete, we'll deliver it to you via a secure download link.
faq.question4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer4: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfer.
faq.question5: What if I need something changed in the video that you have delivered?
faq.answer5: It is not unusual to have small changes or corrections now and then. These ones are free of charge, however if you request a video to be remade entirely from what was agreed we reserve the right to charge a reasonable amount for extra work or not accept the request.
faq.question6: How many videos can you process?
faq.answer6: We can process a larger number of videos. When it comes to short form vids, on average we take 60 videos monthly per client, however we can deliver more.
faq.question7: How do I contact your customer support team?
faq.answer7: You can contact our customer support team via email at
faq.answerSub: or even better message us directly on WhatsApp or Viber

pageHero.question: Have questions? Just
pageHero.question3: and we'd be happy to discuss details with you, free of charge!

aboutPage.title: About Fiva Studio
aboutPage.heading: Our Story
aboutPage.heading2: We're a team of experienced video editors
aboutPage.text: You own a marketing agency, or you're SMM or a content creator that needs someone to process their content and deliver tailored short form videos for yourself or your clients?
aboutPage.headingText: We're a team of experienced video editors who also have experience in managing social media accounts, digital marketing and content creation, so we understand your needs and importance of having a reliable editor who understands the vision behind your or your client's project.
aboutPage.headingText2: We're here to process your videos for you and deliver them under agreed deadlines. How does the process work?
aboutPage.headingText3: We organize a quick meeting where we discuss video content that needs to be made, how it should look like, project specifics like general vibe, quantity, price, deadlines etc.
aboutPage.headingText4: Upon our meeting, if the type of project is something that we do and if we can accommodate and commit to it, we assign best editors for your project / niche.
aboutPage.headingText5: Our edits may vary from what we call 'industry standard' to 'next level edits', thus we can accommodate different request, lower or higher budget
aboutPage.headingText6: Reach out to us now, lets discuss your project and ideas

ecology.title: Ecology Videos
ecology.subtitle: Enhance your ecology videos with our expert editing. Transform your footage into a captivating, professional visual experience.
ecology.heading: Raise Awareness for Environmental Issues with Compelling Video Content
ecology.text: At FIVA Studio, we believe that visual storytelling has the power to inspire change and drive meaningful action. That's why we offer specialized video editing services tailored to the ecological community. Our team of experienced editors and producers are dedicated to creating high-quality nature and ecology videos that raise awareness about environmental issues and promote sustainable living.
ecology.text2: Wildlife conservation documentaries, environmental advocacy campaigns, educational videos for eco-awareness. corporate sustainability reports nature-inspired short films
ecology.text3: Our eco-friendly approach to video production ensures that every project is designed to minimize its carbon footprint while maximizing its impact.
ecology.text4: Sole editing or from script to screen, we'll work closely with you to craft a narrative that inspires audiences to take action and make a difference. Ready to bring your ecological message to life? Contact us today to discuss your project!

corporate.title: Corporate Videos
corporate.subtitle: Elevate Your Corporate Video with Professional Video Editing Services
corporate.text: As a business, creating high-quality corporate videos is essential for communicating your message, engaging with your audience, and showcasing your brand.
corporate.text2: We will edit your client's video and deliver high-quality and stunning visuals that will leave a lasting impression on the client's audience. Whether you're looking to create a promotional video, training video, or company culture film, our video editing services will help you achieve your goals and exceed your expectations.
corporate.text3: Reach out to us now and let's discuss your project together!

food.title: Food and Hospitality
food.subtitle: In the competitive world of food, hospitality, and restaurants, a high-quality video can make all the difference. Our expert video editing services can help you create a visual feast that drives engagement, increases sales, and sets your brand apart from the competition.
food.heading: Hotels, restaurants, cooking, food - video editing service
food.text: With expertise in food, hotel, and restaurant editing, we'll work closely with you to develop a compelling brand story that showcases your unique personality and style. From attention-grabbing sizzle reels to promotional videos that drive sales, our team of experienced editors will craft a visual narrative that resonates with your audience.
food.text2: Get Ready to Serve Up a Visual Feast
food.text3: Partner with us to take your brand to the next level. Contact us today to learn more about our video editing services and let's start creating a mouth-watering video that will leave your audience wanting more!

contentFC.title: Content for children
contentFC.subtitle: Spark Imagination & Learning with Our Child-Friendly Video Editing Services
contentFC.text: Help little minds grow with our expert video editing services designed specifically for children's content.
contentFC.text2: Our team creates engaging, entertaining, and educational videos that captivate young audiences and make learning fun.
contentFC.text3: From nursery rhymes to educational series, our editors bring your vision to life with:
contentFC.text4: Colorful visuals and animations that capture their attention
contentFC.text5: Catchy music and sound effects that stimulate their senses
contentFC.text7: Interactive elements that encourage participation and curiosity
contentFC.text8: Partner with us to create high-quality content that: Entertains and educates small children, Builds brand awareness and loyalty, Develops social skills and emotional intelligence
contentFC.text9: Let us help you bring your child-friendly video ideas to life. Contact us today to learn more about our video editing services and let's start creating a world of wonder for young viewers!

podcast.title: Podcasts
podcast.subtitle: Reach a wider audience and boost your brand with our high-quality podcast video services
podcast.text: Are you tired of sifting through hours of raw audio or video, trying to make sense of it all? Look no further! Our team of skilled podcast editors is here to help you transform your content into a polished, engaging, and professional-grade production. With our podcast editing services, you can rest assured that your show will sound and look its absolute best.

memeVideos.title: Meme Videos
memeVideos.subtitle: Boost your engagement on Social Media with memes, our editors will craft memes for your social media.
memeVideos.text: Meme content, for business? Let’s be honest, barely anyone bothers to engage with generative and business themed posts on social media today! People are not on the internet to watch ads, aren’t they? That is why meme content for business Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook or Yotube is a rising trend.
memeVideos.text2: Businesses get more organic engagement, reach and leads when they successfully play their meme cards as a part of their online communication strategy.
memeVideos.text3: Now what is the trick? Not just anyone can go and create good memes especially for a business profile without coming of as ‘cringe’, ‘sus’, ‘big L’. Many small and large business try this and yet they fail and hurt their brand. For this you need someone with meme mindset and loads of experience in the field so that these simpler yet very effective meme videos are done right.
memeVideos.text4: Meme videos are bold and great way to build your brand image online, correspond to both older and especially upcoming generations.
memeVideos.text5: This is a rising trend and you should catch the train before it goes mainstream.
memeVideos.text6: For long time we have dwelled amongst the dark threads on the internet and we have accumulated great knowledge through memes and about memes, regardless of the type of meme and niche, we speak the language! We create reels, tiktoks, yt shorts memes for social media as well as 2D animated meme videos to present your story, scenario for Youtube channel, or even a TV show.
memeVideos.text7: We understand the audience for each meme and your vision in the project.
memeVideos.text8: Reach out to us now so that we can discuss your project, free of charge!
memeVideos.text9: Please see some of our references:

education.text3: Here is an example of a client that wanted to sell language course online, she was very specific about every detail in her video and we helped her bring her vision to life and improved on her original version:

wedding.title: Wedding Videos
wedding.subtitle: You need a video editor for your educational niche video content like courses, YouTube channel, or Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok? Our video editors are here to bring your vision to life and give your video the desired effect!
wedding.text: At Fiva Studio, we collaborate closely with you to create a wedding video that perfectly captures your vision. From the initial concept to the final edit, we focus on every detail—visuals, sound, and music—to ensure your special day is portrayed with elegance and emotion. Once we align on the desired look and feel, we meticulously craft a beautiful film that showcases your love story and memories.
wedding.text2: For example, we recently worked with a couple who wanted a timeless video of their wedding day. They had specific ideas for how they wanted their ceremony and celebrations depicted. We took their detailed vision and enhanced it with our cinematic expertise, resulting in a stunning video that beautifully captured their unique love story.

estate.title: Professional video editing services for real estate niche
estate.subtitle: Are you a real estate agent or agency, or a real estate photographer/videographer and need someone to edit the videos in style?
estate.text: Through power of color grading, vector images, texts and beautiful compilations that bring out the essence of the property we create real estate videos in landscape and vertical format that can be used as displays and for social media of the real estate agency or agent. Get best visual quality for enterior and exterior footage that give the vibe to the property and highlight their authenticity.
estate.text2: Reach out to us now and let's enroll your project and start creating mesmerizing real estate videos.

film.title: Film / Documentary Videos
film.subtitle: Creating unforgettable stories through documentary and film video content
film.text: At Fiva Studio, we transform raw footage into compelling narratives that captivate and inform audiences. Our documentary editing services are tailored to highlight the essence of your story, ensuring that every frame resonates emotionally and intellectually. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for storytelling, our experienced editors work closely with you to craft a polished final product that reflects your vision. From structuring interviews to enhancing visuals and sound, we are committed to bringing your documentary to life with professionalism and creativity. Let us help you share your message with the world—one frame at a time.

crypto.title: Crypto / Finance
crypto.subtitle: Professional video editing for finance and crypto topics, focused on clarity, precision, and engagement.
crypto.text: At Fiva Studio we understand that conveying complex financial and cryptocurrency topics requires clarity, precision, and engagement. Our finance and crypto video editing services are designed to present your content in a way that captivates your audience while simplifying intricate concepts. Whether you need sleek explainer videos, in-depth tutorials, or dynamic market analyses, our skilled editors collaborate with you to create polished, professional videos that enhance your brand’s credibility. With a focus on maintaining the integrity of your message while utilizing cutting-edge visuals and animations, we ensure your voice stands out in this fast-paced industry. Trust us to help you communicate your ideas effectively and make an impact in the finance and crypto space.
